title: Emmerdale SPOILER: Cain Dingle confronts wife Moira and lover Nate
text:
The intense new trailer for Emmerdale was released on Monday, teasing episodes set to air next week.

Cain Dingle is set to find out his wife Moira has been cheating on him with Nate Robinson, a discovery that could potentially have dire consequences for the trio as they are seen on a boat that explodes in another scene.

But that's not all, as Chas Dingle also goes into labour with her cousin Marlon by her side, supporting her despite being stuck in the men's toilet of the Woolpack pub.

Emmerdale SPOILER: Dramatic scenes saw Cain Dingle confront wife Moira and lover Nate over their affair in an explosive new trailer released on Monday

The trailer opens with the pair, as Marlon desperately tries to get the attention of someone outside their confines to help them out.

As Chas slides down a wall while feeling contractions, Marlon bangs on the door and shouts: 'She's having the baby!'

Meanwhile, things take a turn for the worse as Cain's mother Faith reveals that his wife has 'been having an affair' with Nate, as the trailer shows the lovers curled up in bed together.

Drama: Things took a take a turn for the worse as Cain's mother Faith reveals that his wife has 'been having an affair' with Nate, as the trailer shows the lovers curled up in bed together.

Hitting out: It seems like Cain is set to get his revenge on the lothario as he joins the trio on a small boat in the middle of the lake

It seems like Cain is set to get his revenge on the lothario as he joins the trio on a small boat in the middle of the lake.

Nate and Moira share a look of concern, clearly convinced that something isn't right before the framhand is then seen fighting against Cain.

However the trio's fate is left unclear, as an explosion is set off on the boat and next thing it's left in pieces with Cain, Nate and Moira nowhere in sight.

Giving birth: But that's not all, as Chas Dingle also goes into labour with her cousin Marlon by her side, supporting her despite being stuck in the men's toilet of the Woolpack pub

Concerned: Paddy, who was trying to reunite with his partner, had a look of shock on his face as he held his head in his hands

Back with Marlon and Chas, the pub owner admitted she was 'really scared' of what was going to happen.

Paddy, who was trying desperately to reunite with his partner, had a look of shock on his face as he held his head in his hands.

Emmerdale continues on Monday night at 7pm on ITV.

Stressful: Marlon desperately tries to get the attention of someone outside their confines to help them out, as she admits she's 'really scared'
description: The intense new trailer for Emmerdale was released on Monday, teasing episodes set to air next week.
